name: Sugar Mountain
summary_text: Two brothers, down on their luck, fake a disappearance in the Alaskan wilderness so they'll have a great survival story to sell, but the hoax turns out to be more real than they planned.

name: Ram Jaane
summary_text: A social worker tries diligently to steer a group of wayward street urchins on the right path. But his childhood friend, now a fearless gangster, plans to bring the children into his fold.

name: Lucky Luke
summary_text: Lucky Luke becomes the Sheriff of Daisy Town and runs out all the criminals. Then the Dalton brothers arrive and try to get the Indians to break the peace treaty and attack the town.

name: The Devil's Hand
summary_text: When young girls start to go missing within a religious cult, older followers fear a long-told prophecy while the younger members suspect abusive elders are killing them off.

name: Lucia de B.
summary_text: A young assistant DA puts a serial killing nurse behind bars, only to discover evidence that may prove her innocence.

name: Rudolph's Shiny New Year
summary_text: Rudolph must find Happy, the baby New Year, before midnight on New Year's Eve.

name: Room 6
summary_text: A schoolteacher with a phobia of hospitals finds herself searching for her boyfriend inside one while teaming up with a man suffering the same ordeal that she's in.

name: Masjävlar
summary_text: Mia, who's living in Stockholm, comes home to her small childhood town to celebrate her father's birthday. There she finds herself looked down-upon by her oldest sister; and she has to ...                See full summary »

name: Sweet Land
summary_text: In 1920, Inge, a German national, travels from Norway to rural Minnesota for her arranged marriage to Olaf, a Norwegian farmer; bureaucracy and prejudice cause major complications.

name: Eaten Alive!
summary_text: A young woman teams up with a mercenary to find her missing sister in the jungles of New Guinea where they find that a deranged leader of a religious cult has located his commune in an area inhabited by cannibals.

name: Christmas Made to Order
summary_text: A Hallmark Channel original movie. When architect and Christmas amateur Steven (Jonathan Bennett) finds himself hosting his family for Christmas, he recruits holiday coordinator Gretchen (Alexa PenaVega) to bring holiday joy to his home.

name: Chase
summary_text: A hitman must prove his loyalty to his mentor and best friend, while his girlfriend wants to leave the business behind them.

name: Sur la piste du Marsupilami
summary_text: When reporter Dan Geraldo (Alain Chabat) arrives in Palombia to hunt for a scoop, he never suspects that he is about to make an incredible discovery... With his resourceful local guide ...                See full summary »

name: London Paris New York
summary_text: Nikhil and Lalitha are two completely different individuals who are drawn to each other in spite of their differences -- or perhaps because of it. Follow their journey as they meet in London, Paris and New York for a night in each city.

name: Duvvada Jagannadham
summary_text: Trained by a high profile cop, an encounter specialist masquerading as a Brahmin priest takes on a real estate crime organization after losing his uncle.

name: Outside In
summary_text: An ex-con struggling to readjust to life in his small town forms an intense bond with his former high school teacher.

name: The Thief and the Cobbler
summary_text: A lonely princess and a poor cobbler fall in love while trying to retrieve three magical orbs that were stolen by a bumbling thief, all while outwitting a powerful sorcerer as adventure and comedic pop culture references abound.

name: The Cars That Ate Paris
summary_text: The small town of Paris, Australia deliberately causes car accidents, then sells/salvages all valuables from the wrecks as a means of economy.

name: Har Kisse Ke Hisse: Kaamyaab
summary_text: Sudheer is an actor from the heyday of Bollywood. Years after his retirement, he realizes that he 'retired' on the verge of accomplishing a unique record. He decides to come out of his retirement to complete the round figure of 500.

name: Cyborg She
summary_text: A lonely university student develops a romance with a beautiful interesting woman, who turns out to be a cyborg from the future.

name: Navajo Joe
summary_text: A Native American warrior called Navajo Joe seeks revenge on a gang of sadistic outlaws who has massacred the people of his tribe.

name: Abluka
summary_text: Amid the intense political violence of Istanbul, Kadir is released on parole two years early on the condition that he become an informant for the police gathering terrorist informations, activities, and searching for bombs on trash cans.

name: The Sign of Four
summary_text: The disappearance of a young woman's father and a mysterious note years later after the strange regular annual delivery of valuable pearls to her puts Sherlock Holmes on the case.

name: La llamada
summary_text: María and Susana, two rebellious teens spend their summer in a catholic camp. With music as their common denominator, teen rebellion and ecclesiastic order will collide, creating a hymn to freedom and first love.

name: I Am Bruce Lee
summary_text: Bruce Lee is universally recognized as the pioneer who elevated martial arts in film to an art form, and this documentary will reveal why Bruce Lee's flame burns brighter now than the day he died over three decades ago.

name: Secret Society of Second Born Royals
summary_text: Follows Sam's adventures at a top-secret training program for a new class of second-born royals tasked with saving the world.

name: Blackout
summary_text: Three people from different walks of life find themselves trapped inside a stalled elevator. What at first seems like an inconvenience rapidly escalates into a nightmare.

name: The Trip
summary_text: Romance, politics, sex and humor all collide during two men's 11-year journey of passion, self-discovery and adventure.

name: Hidden Agenda
summary_text: When an American human rights lawyer is assassinated in Belfast, it remains for the man's girlfriend, as well as a tough, no nonsense, police detective to find the truth.

name: Taras Bulba
summary_text: In the 16th-century Ukraine, the Polish overlords and Ukrainian cossacks fight for control of the land but frequent Turkish invasions force them to unite against the common Turkish foe.

name: Fidaa
summary_text: Varun and Bhanu, both from different worlds, face challenges in their relationship.

name: The Evil of Frankenstein
summary_text: Upon returning to his home village to continue his experimental research, the destitute Dr. Frankenstein revives his old creature, but a hypnotist wants the monster to control for himself.

name: Leijonasydän
summary_text: Neo-Nazi falls in love with a woman who has a black son and finds himself fighting with conflicting feelings.

name: There's Only One Jimmy Grimble
summary_text: Jimmy Grimble is a shy Manchester school boy. At school he is constantly being bullied by the other kids, and at home he has to face his mother's new boyfriend who he doesn't like. However,...                See full summary »

name: Levottomat
summary_text: For Ari, nothing feels like anything. He doesn't do relationships, doesn't do attachments. There's only sex. That is until he meets Tiina. Together with Tiina and her closest circle of friends, this could be their last summer of freedom.

name: The Little Devil
summary_text: During an exorcism, father Maurice meets a little devil named Giuditta, who refuses to return to hell and decides to discover the world.

name: Robinson Crusoe
summary_text: The classic story of Robinson Crusoe, a man who is dragged to a desert island after a shipwreck.

name: The Furies
summary_text: A woman is kidnapped and finds herself an unwilling participant in a deadly game where women are hunted by masked men.

name: Reptilicus
summary_text: After copper miners discover part of the frozen tail of a prehistoric monster in Lapland, scientists inadvertently bring it back to life.

name: The Naked Jungle
summary_text: The Leiningen South American cocoa plantation is threatened by a 2-mile-wide, 20-mile-long column of army ants.

name: The Harvey Girls
summary_text: On a train trip West to become a mail-order bride, Susan Bradley (Judy Garland) meets a cheery crew of young women travelling out to open a "Harvey House" restaurant at a remote whistle-stop.

name: Le pari
summary_text: Deux beaux-frères, Didier et Bernard se lancent un défi: chacun ne doit pas fumer pendant quatorze jours. Ce pari, qui se prolongera ultimement sur beaucoup plus longtemps, bouleversera ...                See full summary »

name: Stranger on the Third Floor
summary_text: An aspiring reporter is the key witness at the murder trial of a young man accused of cutting a café owner's throat and is soon accused of a similar crime himself.

name: Driveways
summary_text: A lonesome boy accompanies his mother on a trip to clean out his late aunt's house, and ends up forming an unexpected friendship with the retiree who lives next door.

name: Cazuza: O Tempo Não Pára
summary_text: The life and times of Cazuza, Brazilian singer/poet/enfant terrible, from his start with rock group "Barão Vermelho", to his death from Aids, in 1990, showing his career, love affairs, and involvement with drugs.

name: Billy's Hollywood Screen Kiss
summary_text: Billy is a gay fine-arts photographer who falls in love with straight coffee-shop waiter Gabriel.

name: Clean Slate
summary_text: A private eye who suffers total amnesia every twenty-four hours is deeply entangled in a complicated murder and theft case.

name: Drushyam
summary_text: Rambabu (Venkatesh Daggubati), a cable operator, tries to protect his family from paying the price for their accidental crime.

name: Another You
summary_text: A mental out-patient is mistaken for a missing wealthy man and a con man takes advantage of the situation.

name: Land of Storms
summary_text: Szabolcs quits football against his father's will and returns to his country in Hungary to take charge of an inheritance from his grandfather. There, he meets Aron and they both explore their identities.

name: Root of All Evil?
summary_text: Richard Dawkins' highly critical documentary attacks the pulsing heart of all mainstream religion- faith; with special focus on Islam, Judaism, and Christianity. Contains repeated ...                See full summary »

name: Love Me Tonight
summary_text: A Parisian tailor finds himself posing as a baron in order to collect a sizeable bill from an aristocrat, only to fall in love with an aloof young princess.

name: The Most Beautiful Day
summary_text: Andi and Benno are terminally ill, but before it comes to an end for both, they want to experience the greatest day.

name: The Lost Husband
summary_text: Trying to put her life back together after the death of her husband, Libby and her children move to her estranged Aunt's goat farm in central Texas.

name: Luv Shuv Tey Chicken Khurana
summary_text: A fugitive frantically looks for a much-coveted chicken curry recipe with which his family can reclaim their pride and wealth.

name: Saphirblau
summary_text: Gwen has just discovered, that she's the final member of the secret time-traveling Circle of Twelve. Now she has to juggle with constant trips to the past, her relationships with Gideon and figuring out dark secrets surrounding the Circle.

name: King of Hearts
summary_text: During World War I, a British private, sent ahead to a French town to scout for enemy presence, is mistaken for a King by the colorful patients of an insane asylum.

name: The Oscars
summary_text: The Academy of Motion Picture Arts and Sciences celebrates the year's achievements in film.

name: Dabbe: Bir Cin Vakasi
summary_text: Turkish director Hasan Karacadag is something of an unusual case. In a nation that appears uncertain how to feel about its own history with exploitation film and generally reluctant to ...                See full summary »

name: Red Faction: Origins
summary_text: On a Mars colony in the year 2145, an officer in a rebel militia discovers that his sister, who was abducted a dozen years before, is still alive and has been raised as a soldier whose goal is to bring about the destruction of her brother's faction.

name: Merry Christmas, Drake & Josh
summary_text: Step brothers Drake and Josh must give a foster family the best Christmas ever or face years in jail for a Christmas party gone wrong.

name: Horatio Hornblower: The Duchess and the Devil
summary_text: Lt. Hornblower and his crew are captured by the enemy while escorting a Duchess who has secrets of her own.

name: Boku wa asu, kinou no kimi to dêto suru
summary_text: On the way to his university in Kyoto, a 20 y.o. man falls in love with a woman on the train. He tells her. They start dating. She has a supernatural secret.

name: The Standoff at Sparrow Creek
summary_text: A former cop-turned-militia man investigates a shooting at a police funeral.

name: The Call Up
summary_text: A group of online gamers are invited to try a state-of-the-art virtual reality video game but things take a turn for the sinister when these masters of the shoot 'em up discover they will literally be fighting for their lives.

name: B.A. Pass
summary_text: A young boy is seduced by a woman who later turns him into a gigolo (male prostitute).

name: Thoovanathumbikal
summary_text: Jayakrishnan falls in love with two girls, Radha and Clara, and fights his confusion about whom he should marry and spend his life with.

name: Night Passage
summary_text: A fired railroad man is re-hired and trusted to carry a ten thousand dollar payroll in secret, even though he is suspected of being connected to outlaws.

name: Turk 182
summary_text: Jimmy Lynch is angry because his older brother, who was injured as a result of an off duty fire rescue, is denied benefits by the city.

name: Thérèse
summary_text: An unhappily married woman struggles to break free from social pressures.

name: Tierra
summary_text: Angel, an exterminator recently released from a mental hospital, comes to rid a small Spanish town of tiny grubs in the soil. The local wine-making industry has found these pests ...                See full summary »

name: Action in the North Atlantic
summary_text: An American tanker's sunk by a German U-boat and the survivors spend 11 days at sea on a raft. Their next assignment; bound for Murmansk through the sub-stalked N. Atlantic.

name: Killerman
summary_text: Two NYC money launderers make a quick drug deal. Things go wrong, as dirty cops are involved. One of the friends gets amnesia during their escape with the drugs and money.

name: Samurai Cop 2: Deadly Vengeance
summary_text: It's 25 years later, and police detective Frank Washington is forced to team up again with his long estranged partner Joe Marshall to investigate a series of assassinations, in a case with ingredients they could never have imagined.

name: Love.net
summary_text: Follows the parallel stories of a number of characters who are trying to change their lives via the Internet or are simply having fun online.

name: Takeshis'
summary_text: Beat Takeshi, a prominent actor, meets a lookalike named Kitano, who is a struggling actor, but after the meeting, Kitano's dreams take a violent, surreal turn.

name: Gas Food Lodging
summary_text: A waitress lives with her two teen daughters in a trailer park in New Mexico. They all want a boyfriend.

name: Eltilerin Savasi
summary_text: Known for their devotion to social media, Gizem and Sultan's understanding of marriage is different. Two women enter into an endless competition with each other.

name: Arahan jangpung daejakjeon
summary_text: As a dorky cop falls in with five Tao masters who admire his c'hi, an ancient foe comes looking for them all.

name: The Celestine Prophecy
summary_text: An adaptation of James Redfield's novel about the search for a sacred manuscript in the Peruvian rain forest.

name: The End
summary_text: Slapstick black comedy about a man (Reynolds) who finds that he hasn't much longer to live and has bungled his attempts at suicide.

name: Burn
summary_text: When a gas station is held at gunpoint by a desperate man in need of cash, a lonely and unstable gas station attendant, tired of being overshadowed by her more outgoing co-worker, finds an opportunity to make a connection with the robber.

name: Le brio
summary_text: After an incident, a brilliant professor known for his outbursts is forced to mentor the student he wronged for a speech contest.

name: When Animals Dream
summary_text: 16-year old Marie lives on a small island with her seriously ill mother and her father, who takes care of the family. But suddenly mysterious deaths happen and Marie can feel something strange happening to her body.

name: Plump Fiction
summary_text: Follows the plot of Pulp Fiction (1994). Scenes from other movies are also parodied.

name: Büyü
summary_text: A group of archeologists are determined to make digs on a ghost town to find an old book, ignoring that the town is cursed due to events occurred about seven hundred years ago. An evil spirit comes to haunt this team...

name: Thrashin'
summary_text: Two skateboarding gangs battle each other for supremacy, and a member of one gang falls in love with the sister of his rival.

name: Die weiße Massai
summary_text: A girl, Carola, whose vacation in Kenya takes an interesting turn when she becomes infatuated with a Masai. Carola decides to leave her boyfriend to stay with her lover. There, she has to ...                See full summary »

name: The Housemaid
summary_text: A composer and his wife are thrown into turmoil when a housemaid becomes more than they bargained for.

name: Committed
summary_text: A young woman goes in search of her midlife crisis suffering husband who left her.

name: Back to Bataan
summary_text: In 1942, after the fall of the Philippines to the Japanese, U.S. Army Col. Joseph Madden stays behind to organize the local resistance against the Japanese invaders.

name: Be Somebody
summary_text: Pop superstar Jordan Jaye has a big dream - he just wants to live like a regular teenager. When he's chased down by some excited female fans, he finds a perfect hideout and a reluctant new ...                See full summary »

name: Poklosie
summary_text: A Polish man who returns home after the death of his father unearths a secret about the now-deceased Jewish residents of his village.

name: The Girl King
summary_text: THE GIRL KING paints a portrait of the brilliant, extravagant Kristina of Sweden, queen from age six, who fights the conservative forces that are against her ideas to modernize Sweden and who have no tolerance for her awakening sexuality.

name: Artists and Models
summary_text: Rick Todd uses the dreams of his roommate Eugene as the basis for a successful comic book.

name: Block-Heads
summary_text: Stan, who has remained faithfully at his World War I post for twenty years, finally comes home where his best friend, Ollie, takes him in, thus allowing him to discover the many conveniences of the modern world.

name: Sluzhebnyy roman. Nashe vremya
summary_text: Meet Liudmila Kalugina, she's a young businesswoman, a CEO of her own company, though not liked by her dependents and no time for personal life. Everything changes when she gets to know ...                See full summary »

name: Jim Jefferies: This Is Me Now
summary_text: The gleefully irreverent Jefferies skewers "grabby" celebrities, political hypocrisy and his own ill-advised career moves in a brash stand-up special.

name: Jim Gaffigan: Beyond the Pale
summary_text: In this brand-new comedy performance, he's more hilarious than ever with his unique style of self-deprecating observations and catty audience commentary.

name: The Best Man
summary_text: A guy tries to help his best friend win the attention of the girl of his dreams.

name: Silent Fall
summary_text: An autistic boy witnesses his parents' double murder. A controversial therapist seeks to probe the child's mind in order to solve the case.

name: Argo
summary_text: The crew of Tibi Balogh sets out on a journey across Hungary to get the ancient Gold Owl statue, as well as the Milk Man. The treasure is worth millions, who gets there first?

name: Voroshilovskiy strelok
summary_text: Veteran of World War II takes revenge on three scums who raped his naive granddaughter.

name: Suwingu gâruzu
summary_text: A tale of delinquent and lazy school girls. In their efforts to cut remedial summer math class, they end up vitiating and replacing the schools brass band.

name: Ungli
summary_text: A gang of friends decide to take justice into their own hands.

name: Dear God
summary_text: When letters written to God start getting results, and replies, people everywhere are amazed. The post office, however, is annoyed.

name: Twenty Bucks
summary_text: A story about the life of a twenty dollar bill as it weaves in and out of the various lives of several people.

name: Stepfather II: Make Room for Daddy
summary_text: After escaping the insane asylum in which he was incarcerated, Jerry Blake (Terry O'Quinn) impersonates a marriage counselor and manages to win over a patient (Meg Foster) and her young son (Jonathan Brandis).

name: Ulysses
summary_text: A movie adaptation of Homer's second epic, that depicts Ulysses' efforts to return to his home after the end of ten years of war.

name: Johan Falk: GSI - Gruppen för särskilda insatser
summary_text: Policeman Johan Falk returns to Gothenburg and starts service at the successful special service GSI, but the relation between the unit and the criminals introduces him to a world he never thought existed.

name: Crush
summary_text: Three female friends behave badly.

name: Comedy Central Roast of Justin Bieber
summary_text: Several roasters, and the master himself Kevin Hart, make fun of Justin Bieber.

name: Aagadu
summary_text: An encounter specialist is transferred as CI to a village which is ruled by a local gangster

name: The Egyptian
summary_text: In ancient Egypt, a poor orphan becomes a genial physician and is eventually appointed at the Pharaoh's court where he witnesses palace intrigues and learns dangerous royal secrets.

name: State Fair
summary_text: The Frake family attends the annual Iowa State Fair; each member of the clan has their own reason for doing so.

name: East Side Sushi
summary_text: Single mom Juana can slice and dice anything with great speed and precision. After working at a fruit-vending cart for years, she decides to take a job at a local Japanese restaurant. ...                See full summary »

name: Chiko
summary_text: Loyalty between two friends is stretched to its limit by one's deception.

name: The Beast
summary_text: Leonida Riva is a gloomy, solitary war veteran, once Captain of the Army's special forces. Life and work have driven Riva apart from his family. His eldest son, Mattia, has never forgiven ...                See full summary »

name: Rainbow
summary_text: Believing actor and goodwill ambassador Shah Rukh Khan can help her brother get an operation to restore his sight, a 10-year old girl takes her blind 8-year old brother on a trek across Rajasthan in search of the superstar.

name: The Model
summary_text: Emma, an emerging model, struggles to enter the Parisian fashion scene and develops a dangerous obsession for fashion photographer Shane White.

name: Natural Born Pranksters
summary_text: YouTube's best pranksters, Roman Atwood, Vitaly Z, and Dennis Roady make the leap to the big screen.

name: Night of the Living Deb
summary_text: After a girls' night out, endearingly awkward Deb wakes up in the apartment of the most attractive guy in Portland, Maine. Pretty boy Ryan only knows it was a mistake and ushers her out the door into a full-scale zombie apocalypse.

name: Area 407
summary_text: Survivors of an airplane crash find themselves within the borders of a government testing area and pursued by predators.

name: Men in Hope
summary_text: When the father teaches his son in-law about the perks of cheating, things take unexpected turns...

name: The Most Wonderful Time of the Year
summary_text: Corporate analyst and single mom, Jen, tackles Christmas with a business-like approach until her uncle arrives with a handsome stranger in tow.

name: Stroker Ace
summary_text: The title character, a popular NASCAR driver, clashes with the fried-chicken mogul that sponsors his racing team.

name: Bud Abbott Lou Costello Meet the Killer Boris Karloff
summary_text: Two employees of a secluded hotel investigate a murder on the premises in which the goofy bellboy is the prime suspect.

name: Kyon Ki...
summary_text: After learning the sad truth about a patient, a female psychiatrist falls in love with him.

name: The Gingerdead Man
summary_text: An evil yet adorable Gingerbread man comes to life with the soul of a convicted killer - this real life cookie monster wreaks havoc on the girl who sent the killer to the electric chair.

name: Marked Woman
summary_text: A crusading district attorney persuades a clip joint hostess to testify against her mobster boss after her innocent sister is accidentally murdered during one of his unsavory parties.

name: Mythica: The Darkspore
summary_text: Marek and her company must go on a journey and prevent Szorlok from obtaining all the shards of the Darkspore, or all will be lost.

name: Mad Love
summary_text: The love story that transformed Juana, Queen of Spain, into Juana "the Mad". A story of passions, lies and jealousy with a political motive behind.

name: The Mummy's Hand
summary_text: Archaeologists defile the tomb of mummified Kharis, who was buried alive for falling in love with an Egyptian princess.

name: Spike Island
summary_text: Five teenage friends will stop at nothing to attend a concert by their favourite band, The Stone Roses.

name: Pu-239
summary_text: A worker at a Russian nuclear facility gets exposed to a lethal dose of radiation. In order to provide for his family, he steals some plutonium and sets out to sell it on Moscow's black market with the help of an incompetent criminal.

name: A Chump at Oxford
summary_text: As a reward for capturing a bank robber, Stan and Ollie get scholarship to Oxford, but are met with resentment by other students.

name: Hope Gap
summary_text: A couple's visit with their son takes a dramatic turn when the father tells him he plans on leaving his mother.

name: I... comme Icare
summary_text: Conspiracy thriller inspired by the conspiracy theories surrounding the assassination of JFK. After a fictional president is assassinated, a determined, tough prosecutor investigates the emerging conspiracy behind it.

name: 633 Squadron
summary_text: An RAF squadron is assigned to knock out a German rocket fuel factory in Norway. The factory supplies fuel for the Nazi effort to launch rockets on England during D-Day.

name: Kong Zi
summary_text: The life story of the highly-influential Chinese philosopher, Confucius.

name: Left Behind III: World at War
summary_text: The world falls into chaos as Nicolae Carpathia detonates nuclear devices across the globe and stages multiple devastating attacks against both the Tribulation Force and an international militia, led by U.S. President Gerald Fitzhugh.

name: Nightfall
summary_text: Through a series of bizarre coincidences, an artist finds himself falsely accused of bank robbery and murder and is pursued by the authorities and the real killers.
A group of astronauts living in the haunting emptiness of deep space awake to find earth has suffered an extinction level event.

name: Family is Family
summary_text: Valentin D is a hot designer architect who claims to be an orphan because he is too ashamed to admit he is the son of working-class scrap metal merchants from the north of France.

name: Moolaadé
summary_text: When a woman shelters a group of girls from suffering female genital mutilation, she starts a conflict that tears her village apart.

name: The Hitman
summary_text: A Cop goes undercover as a Hitman to bring down a criminal organization.

name: Can't Stop the Music
summary_text: A pseudo autobiography of disco's The Village People.

name: The Food of the Gods
summary_text: A group of friends travel to a remote Canadian island to hunt, only to be attacked by giant killer animals which have populated the place.

name: Gopala Gopala
summary_text: An atheist sues god after losing his shop in an earthquake.

name: Woody Woodpecker
summary_text: The hyperactive red-headed bird enters a turf war with a big city lawyer wanting to tear down his home in an effort to build a house to flip.

name: Alle Anderen
summary_text: While on a Mediterranean vacation, a seemingly happy boyfriend and girlfriend find their connection to one another tested as they bond with another couple.

name: The Class
summary_text: Class of teenage students attempting to save their unconventional school from closure, which was one of the highest-grossing Turkish films of 2007.

name: Boys
summary_text: 'Boys' is the story of five boys and a girl from different families They are youthful, vibrant, careless violating all conventions and In the process, they discover their hidden talents.

name: Scary or Die
summary_text: Five complete strangers attempt to escape a gruesome demise by a clown that feeds upon human flesh.

name: The Yin-Yang Master: Dream of Eternity
summary_text: Qing Ming, the Yin-Yang Master, took his master's last wish and went to the Captial Tiandu City to attend the heaven ceremony.

name: The Russian Specialist
summary_text: A Russian ex-hit man is called back to Russia for one last job. This time against his former employees, the Russian mob.

name: I'm All Right Jack
summary_text: A naive aristocrat in search of a career becomes caught up in the struggles between his profit-minded uncle and an aggressive labor union.

name: The Hippopotamus
summary_text: Disgraced poet Ted Wallace is summoned to his friend's country manor to investigate a series of unexplained miracles.

name: Panjaa
summary_text: Ordered by his boss to take out a former gang member who has switched sides, a hitman takes the rival gang leader's son hostage, unaware of the violent mayhem his own boss' son will ignite.

name: The Jerk Theory
summary_text: The lead singer/guitarist of a high school rock band openly and unapologetically proclaims himself a newly converted jerk; however, the right girl comes along who could change him back to his former sweet self.

name: Dead Leaves
summary_text: Two awaken on Earth with no recollection of their past and embark on a devastating crime spree but are sent to an infamous lunar penitentiary named Dead Leaves.

name: Olanlar Oldu
summary_text: Zafer, a sailor living with his mother Döndü in a coastal village in Izmir, has just broke up with his girlfriend Mehtap whose father is also a sailor. While Döndü and her friend, Fahriye ...                See full summary »

name: Les misérables
summary_text: A variation on Victor Hugo's classic novel by means of the story of a man whose life is affected by and somewhat duplicated by the Hugo story of the beleaguered Jean Valjean.

name: Lord Jim
summary_text: After being discredited as a coward, a 19th century seaman lives for only one purpose: to redeem himself.

name: The Rose Tattoo
summary_text: A Sicilian seamstress who idolizes her husband must deal with several family crises upon his sudden death.

name: Joseph
summary_text: The story develops through the life of four retired policemen. It has the tone of a thriller investigation. An issue affecting the life of Joseph, the central character, and his family is being investigated.

name: Boogie Woogie
summary_text: A comedy of manners set against the backdrop of contemporary London and the international art scene.

name: Mrs Dalloway
summary_text: In 1923 London, socialite Clarissa Dalloway's (Vanessa Redgrave's) well-planned party is overshadowed by the return of an old suitor she had known thirty-three years earlier.

name: Daai laap mat taam Ling Ling Fat
summary_text: A wild and hilariously anachronistic tale of an imperial guard of the Forbidden City who has no martial arts abilities but a talent for making futuristic machines and must save the kidnapped emperor.

name: Boys in the Trees
summary_text: On Halloween 1997, two estranged teen skaters embark on a surreal journey through their memories, dreams and fears.

name: Black Mountain Side
summary_text: At a cold, desolate, northmost outpost in Canada, an archaeological discovery is made. A specialist arrives Nov. 1. Strange things happen. All contact with the outside world is down.

name: Cheaters
summary_text: Eleven students conspire with their teacher to cheat on an academic competition.

name: Raid dingue
summary_text: A clumsy girl dreams about joining to an elite special forces team.

name: Gun
summary_text: A drama set in the world of gun-running.

name: Si j'étais toi
summary_text: A wife and mother passes away, and spirit returns in her daughter's body.

name: Xia ri fu xing
summary_text: 5 HK cops (4 horny males) on vacation in Pattaya, Thailand, are told to contact an informant there but he gets murdered. They return to Hong Kong to contact his girlfriend and protect her. 3 other colleagues are busy fighting criminals.

name: Gülen Adam
summary_text: The story of a man who can not stop laughing whatever the situation he is in even his birth as a baby.

name: Ebola Syndrome
summary_text: A restaurant employee wanted for murder contracts Ebola by raping a woman in South Africa and starts an outbreak there and in Hong Kong when he returns home.

name: Lili Marleen
summary_text: In 1938, a German singer falls in love with a Jewish composer in Zurich, who helps Jews flee Nazi Germany. She wants to help but is forced back to Germany. Her song "Lili Marleen" becomes a hit with soldiers and the Nazi top.

name: Zenon: The Zequel
summary_text: A mischievous fifteen-year-old girl living on a space station helps a group of homeless aliens.

name: Mutafukaz
summary_text: In Dark Meat City, a young man develops supernatural powers after an otherwise uneventful scooter accident.

name: Den tredje vågen
summary_text: Johan Falk hasn't been working for over a year since he resigned from the police. Most of all he wants to move out to the countryside, but fate has a different thought.

name: Female Prisoner #701: Scorpion
summary_text: After being used and betrayed by the detective she had fallen in love with, young Matsu is sent to a female prison full of sadistic guards and disobedient prisoners.

name: Havenhurst
summary_text: A troubled young woman takes up residence in a gothic apartment building where she must confront a terrifying evil.

name: Pitfall
summary_text: A man wanders into a seemingly deserted town with his young son in search of work. But after a bit of bad luck, he joins the town's population of lost souls.

name: Vive L'Amour
summary_text: Three lonely young denizens of Taipei unknowingly share an apartment used for sexual trysts.

name: Dead Story
summary_text: A young couple move into their dream house, only to find out they are not alone.

name: Siccîn
summary_text: Öznur is a young and beautiful woman. She has had a platonic love since childhood to Kudret, who is her cousin. Kudret, however, is married to a woman named Nisa and is very happy. Jealous,...                See full summary »

name: Hour of the Gun
summary_text: Marshal Wyatt Earp kills a couple of men of the Clanton gang in a fight. In revenge, Clanton's thugs kill the Marshal's brother. Thus, Wyatt starts to chase the killers together with his friend Doc Holliday.

name: On a Clear Day You Can See Forever
summary_text: A troubled young woman who visits a psychotherapist to help her quit smoking undergoes hypnosis and finds herself reliving a tragic Victorian romance from a past life.

name: Blaze
summary_text: A middle-aged Louisiana governor falls in love with a young stripper, which jeopardizes his political career and the radical policies which have made him a controversial figure.

name: Katma Deger Saban
summary_text: Shaban comes from Germany to Turkey as a singer and falls in love with a Turkish beautiful woman.

name: Holiday
summary_text: A love triangle featuring the trophy girlfriend of a petty drug lord, caught up in a web of luxury and violence in a modern dark gangster tale set in the beautiful port city of Bodrum on the Turkish Riviera.

name: Cinema Verite
summary_text: A behind-the-scenes look at the making of the first American family to be the subjects of a reality TV show.

name: King's Ransom
summary_text: Hoping to foil his own gold-digging wife's plan, a loathsome businessman arranges his own kidnapping, only to realize that there are plenty of other people interested in his wealth as well.

name: Gueros
summary_text: Tomas is too much for his lone mother so she sends him to live with his older brother Federico, aka Sombra, in Mexico City.

name: Wild Grass
summary_text: A quirky woman who spends her free time as a pilot has her purse stolen; when a mysterious man finds her wallet, they embark on a peculiar romance.

name: An Eye for an Eye
summary_text: A SFPD undercover narcotics cop aims to avenge his partner's death and destroy a drug-smuggling ring operated by the Chinese Triads.

name: Spiral
summary_text: A recluse telemarkets at an office, where his boss is his only friend. As he befriends a new, social colleague and sketches/paints her, his dark mind surfaces.

name: Borsalino
summary_text: During the 1930s, in Marseilles, France, two small time crooks work for local crime bosses until they decide to go into business for themselves.

name: Peep World
summary_text: Four siblings implode after the release of a book written about them.

name: Sometimes a Great Notion
summary_text: A family of fiercely independent Oregon loggers struggle to keep the family business alive amidst changing times.

name: The Hallelujah Trail
summary_text: On its way to Denver, a cargo of whiskey destined for the miners, is sought after by the Temperance League, the U.S. Cavalry, the local Indians and the miners themselves.

name: Horrors of Spider Island
summary_text: Survivors of a plane crash on a remote island find it is covered by spiders. When bitten, the survivors start turning into spiders!

name: Greener Grass
summary_text: Suburban soccer moms find themselves constantly competing against each other in their personal lives as their kids settle their differences on the field.

name: The Beast Within
summary_text: A young woman gets raped by a mysterious man-creature, and years later her son begins a horrific transformation into a similar beast.

name: Caged
summary_text: A naive 19-year-old widow becomes coarsened and cynical when she is sent to a women's prison and is exposed to hardened criminals and sadistic guards.

name: Double Dhamaal
summary_text: Four slackers decide to avenge their humiliation at the hands of a con-man.

name: The Nutcracker: The Untold Story
summary_text: In 1920s Vienna, a young girl receives a magical doll on Christmas Eve.

name: The Christmas Card
summary_text: US soldier visits the town from where an inspirational Christmas card was sent to him by a church group that mails cards out to servicemen as a goodwill effort.

name: The Passion of Darkly Noon
summary_text: A young man who has spent his life as a member of an ultraconservative Christian cult, loses his parents and becomes disoriented, wandering into a forest and meeting a coffin transporter, a caring woman, her mute boyfriend, and his mother.

name: Babes in Toyland
summary_text: Tom the Piper's Son is about to marry Mary Quite Contrary. On the eve of their wedding, evil miser Barnaby hires two henchmen to drown Tom and steal Mary's sheep, cared for by Little Bo ...                See full summary »

name: Snow Flower and the Secret Fan
summary_text: A story set in nineteenth-century China and focusing on the life-long friendship between two girls who develop their own secret code as a way to contend with the rigid social norms imposed on women.

name: Once Upon a Time in China and America
summary_text: Following an ambush in his visit to America, Wong Fei-hung becomes separated from his fellow travelers and suffers memory loss.

name: That Old Feeling
summary_text: A bride's divorced parents find their old feelings for each other during the wedding reception and over the course of the next few days upsetting the newlywed's honeymoon.

name: Four Bags Full
summary_text: Two men carry at night four suitcases of contraband meat across German-occupied Paris during WWII. Their opposite personalities and strange encounters provoke different adventures - until they are arrested by the police.

name: The Diary of Ellen Rimbauer
summary_text: The wife of an oil tycoon becomes engrossed in the sinister evil residing within her Seattle mansion home.

name: The Vertical Ray of the Sun
summary_text: With the brilliant Vietnamese summer as a setting Vertical Ray of the Sun is beautiful from beginning to end. The plot centres around three sisters, two of whom are happily married (or so ...                See full summary »

name: Grace of My Heart
summary_text: Edna wins a recording contract singing her own song at a competition in 1958. After trying to make it as a singer/songwriter for 11 months in NYC, she has success writing songs for others at the Brill Building.

name: Madame Bovary
summary_text: In nineteenth-century France, the romantic daughter of a country squire marries a dull country doctor. To escape boredom, she throws herself into love affairs with a suave local landowner and a law student, and runs up ruinous debts.

name: Get Out Your Handkerchiefs
summary_text: A worried husband finds a lover for his depressed wife, but she falls in love with a bullied thirteen-year-old math prodigy and wants to have the boy's baby.

name: Sanatorium pod Klepsydra
summary_text: Józef visits his dying father at a remote mental institution, where time itself doesn't seem to exist, and the line between dreams and memories becomes indistinguishable.

name: Middle of Nowhere
summary_text: An irresponsible mother blows her eldest daughter's college fund on her youngest daughter's modeling campaign.

name: Arctic Blast
summary_text: When a solar eclipse sends a colossal blast of super chilled air towards the earth, it then sets off a catastrophic chain of events that threatens to engulf the world in ice and begin a new Ice Age.

name: Anne B. Real
summary_text: The coming of age story of a young female rapper, who finds her inspiration by reading the Diary of Anne Frank.

name: Spriggan
summary_text: An elite superhuman agent must stop a foreign military unit from seizing control of an ancient artifact that holds the key to ultimate power.

name: The Lost World
summary_text: Professor Challenger leads an expedition of scientists and adventurers to a remote plateau deep in the Amazonian jungle to verify his claim that dinosaurs still live there.

name: 'G' Men
summary_text: James Cagney helped jump-start the gangster genre as The Public Enemy. Outcries against movies that glorified underworld criminals put Cagneyon the side of the law in "G" Men.

name: My Days of Mercy
summary_text: The daughter of a man on death row falls in love with a woman on the opposing side of her family's political cause.

name: The Family Friend
summary_text: Geremia, an aging tailor/money lender, is a repulsive, mean, stingy man who lives alone in his shabby house with his scornful, bedridden mother. He has a morbid, obsessive relationship with...                See full summary »

name: Den bästa sommaren
summary_text: Two kids move in with a lonely undertaker who is secretly in love with the town's school teacher.

name: Hellboy Animated: Blood and Iron
summary_text: Hellboy (Ron Perlman) and his team face off against a new supernatural threat, while Professor Bruttenholm (Sir John Hurt) must investigate the possible reemergence of a vampire he had slain decades prior.

name: Schultze Gets the Blues
summary_text: Schultze is an accordion player and newly without work. When the local music club celebrates its 50th anniversary, his taste of music changes unexpectedly.

name: Godzilla vs. Megaguirus
summary_text: Japan creates an artificial black hole device to trap Godzilla forever, but a test of the device creates new foes for Godzilla, car-sized dragonflies called meganula and their queen, Megaguirus.

name: C.O.G.
summary_text: A cocky young man travels to Oregon to work on an apple farm. Out of his element, he finds his lifestyle and notions being picked apart by everyone who crosses his path.

name: The Cyclone
summary_text: Levante lives in a small city near Florence (Tuscany, Italy) and his life is plain and a bit boring, until the day the twister arrives: a bus with six Spanish flamenco dancers that will twist Levante and his family life.

name: The End of Summer
summary_text: The family of an older man who runs a small sake brewery become concerned with his finances and his health after they discover him visiting an old mistress from his youth.

name: Varn!ng för Jönssonligan
summary_text: The movie begins with the Jönsson gang making a minor burglary. It goes wrong and the gang leader, Sickan, gets caught. After he has spent 10 months in jail, Vanheden and Rocky come to ...                See full summary »

name: Les beaux gosses
summary_text: A coming-of-age tale about an adolescent boy and his efforts to fit in amongst a varied cast of characters.

name: The Business of Strangers
summary_text: Two businesswomen bond and reveal their inner natures while getting carried away on a revenge attack against an accused rapist.

name: The Squad
summary_text: A French police unit that try to stop a group of criminals.

name: Boarding Gate
summary_text: A beautiful woman, Sandra, seduces a wealthy businessman, Miles Rennburg. Little does he realise that she has been sent to kill him at the behest of her boyfriend/crime partner, Lester. Controlling all this is Sue, Lester's wife.

name: Unearthed
summary_text: An unknown creature terrorizes an archeological dig in the middle of a desolate New Mexico town.

name: Sommeren '92
summary_text: The 1992 Danish football team competes for the European Championship.

name: That Girl in Yellow Boots
summary_text: A British woman faces challenges while attempting to locate her father in India.

name: Scandal
summary_text: A celebrity photograph sparks a court case as a tabloid magazine spins a scandalous yarn over a painter and a famous singer.

name: The Girl in the Photographs
summary_text: A bored young woman in a sleepy community called Spearfish starts receiving photographs of brutally murdered young women. Are they real or staged? The culprit is either a serial killer or some creep with a sick sense of humour.

name: Thattathin Marayathu
summary_text: The struggles faced when a Hindu man falls in love with a Muslim woman and the disapproval of her family.

name: Ichi
summary_text: Ichi is a blind woman who roams about town with her shamisen (a three-stringed Japanese guitar), but she has exceptional sword skills with which she fights off yakuza and other villains.

name: Uno sceriffo extraterrestre... poco extra e molto terrestre
summary_text: A young humanoid alien who gets stranded on earth hooks up with a grizzled old sheriff in a western town and tries to help him solve a tough case, but the sheriff doesn't want any help from a "kid."
